description: A Flutter widget file defining a NoteCard widget and a helper _TextColumn for displaying Note objects in a list, including UI components and interaction handlers.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a card UI for displaying a note, with optional tap and delete actions.

classes.name: _TextColumn
classes.description: A private stateless widget used internally by NoteCard to layout note title, content preview, and update timestamp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for NoteCard and _TextColumn, arranging UI elements and styling.

methods.name: _two
methods.description: Formats an integer to a two-digit string, used for date and time display.

calls: MaterialPageRoute (implied by usage of MaterialApp widgets)
Padding, Row, Expanded, IconButton, SizedBox (layout widgets)
